caseTitle: Habibullah Energy Ltd. v. WAPDA thr. its Chairman & others
tagline: The process of awarding lease of a Power Generation Company for 20 years by WAPDA to the respondent is not sustainable as the transaction in question, by no stretch of imagination, is legal, transparent, fair, open or the result of a competitive and fair process. The Power Plant is a public asset and those entrusted therewith were sadly found wanting. Direction is issued to the Federal Government to fix civil and criminal liabilities in this regard.
